question: The Rushikulya River, that was making news recently, flows in which state of India?
explanation: Rushikulya River is one of the major rivers in Odisha and is site of large scale nesting of olive ridley sea turtles. The mass nesting of the turtles begins in February-March. The Rushikulya rookery on the Odisha coast is being prepared to protect olive ridley turtles during mass nesting.
